about_the_game: Romancelvania’s original soundtrack is over 2 hours of music that is as eclectic as the game itself. Classic horror instrumentation like pipe organ and theremin are present, but there are also classical strings, shred-metal lead guitar, electronica dance beats, beatnik jazz sax, thunderous drums, soothing harp, not-so-soothing accordian, 12-string acoustic guitar, hippie drum circles, plucky harpsichord, kitsch-y 50’s vibraphone, Alpine horn (and yodeling!), analog synthesizers, opera singers, down-n-dirty blues harmonica, a men’s chorus, Italian mandolins, funk bass, 8-bit chip-tunes, Jamaican steel drums, Japanese shakuhachi flute, Persian Santur and other exotic world instruments… even a medley of Christmas carols.
detailed_description: Romancelvania’s original soundtrack is over 2 hours of music that is as eclectic as the game itself. Classic horror instrumentation like pipe organ and theremin are present, but there are also classical strings, shred-metal lead guitar, electronica dance beats, beatnik jazz sax, thunderous drums, soothing harp, not-so-soothing accordian, 12-string acoustic guitar, hippie drum circles, plucky harpsichord, kitsch-y 50’s vibraphone, Alpine horn (and yodeling!), analog synthesizers, opera singers, down-n-dirty blues harmonica, a men’s chorus, Italian mandolins, funk bass, 8-bit chip-tunes, Jamaican steel drums, Japanese shakuhachi flute, Persian Santur and other exotic world instruments… even a medley of Christmas carols.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1290 MB available space

short_description: Jim Bonney has composed over 2 hours of moody and ecclectic soundscapse. In total, there are 57 tracks that are sure to get countless hours of play. Enjoy!
